Trade/Device Name(s): ELITech Clinical Systems HbA1c Calibrator Set
ELITech Clinical Systems HbA1c Control L+H
Regulation Name(s): Calibrator for Hemoglobin or Hematocrit measurement
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ELITech Clinical Systems HbA1c immunoturbidimetric assay, calibrator set, and control set for quantitative determination of hemoglobin A1c in human whole blood on Vital Scientific Selectra/Flexor analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative in vitro diagnostic determination of hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) in human whole blood on Vital Scientific Selectra/Flexor analyzers to monitor long-term blood glucose control in diabetic patients; calibrator and control sets for use with the assay.
